properties.description: Posted by Alexdc

properties.name: Audio Expansion
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc1721 NE 17th Way, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33305Audio Expansion\'s podcast production and consulting services enable our clients with the ability to begin podcasting with confidence now. We assist businesses and organizations of all types to effectively leverage the many benefits of podcasting, by providing the solutions your company needs in order to expand its marketing and communications efforts with podcasts. From podcast strategy consulting, to podcast concept and content design, to complete podcast production - we have the experience and skills needed to get your business or brand podcasting today.

properties.name: Barrio305
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcBarrio 305 is a multiplatform media property targeting the U.S. based Latino youth segment. Barrio 305 aims to be the destination of choice for the fastest growing segment of the U.S. population by offering original programming via broadband video as well as a platform for user generated content through it\'s own social network. The original programming consists of all access coverage on the following: the Latino music scene, car shows, street fashion, urban art and latina swimsuit models. The user generated content consists of a social network where users customize their own profiles with a suite of tools made available on Barrio 305 i.e. Slide show generators, video uploads, photosharing , Flash Video Chat (coming Oct. 2006) and more.

properties.name: CBS Sportsline
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc2200 West Cypress Creek Road, ft lauderdale, fl 33309CBS SportsLine is at the leading edge of media companies providing Internet sports content, Fantasy sports and e-commerce. In addition to its flagship service, the company publishes the official Web sites of the NFL and NCAA Sports. CBS SportsLine.com is a member of the CBS family and a part of CBS Interactive. For more information about CBS SportsLine.com and for the latest sports news, scores and expert analysis, please visit cbs.sportsline.com.

properties.name: CareerMetaSearch
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcFort Lauderdale, FL, USAeCoaching is the capability for a golf instructor to be in one physical location and the actual student to physically be in another location. So, the instructor could be here in Orlando, and the student could be in his office in New York. And what happens is that, as long as you have a broad band Internet connection, the instructor basically opens up an eCoaching Live, which is an Internet browser-based software. The instructor actually just logs in, says "I\'m here, hello." The student then sees that he\'s there and logs in.

properties.name: Date.com
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc1521 Alton Road #626, Miami Beach, FL 33139At Date.com, we know that even the best relationships require work. That\'s why Date.com is a relationship community committed to helping its members find and maintain the best relationship for them. We always strive to support our members as an educated relationship advisor, but also as a caring friend. Here you can meet millions of other people in a safe, private and fun environment. We are the premier resource for all of your dating and relationship needs with: * Expert advice * Chat and IM * Community support * Local events * Personality profiles * Informative, interactive Webzine * Free Newsletters

Suite 200, Miami, FL 33133Dotmarketing is a leading interactive agency specializing in web professional services , web design and open-source application development . At Dotmarketing, we constantly work to build innovative and complete web solutions for associations , higher education institutions and businesses . Our commitment to customized strategies and meticulous web development services enables us to establish and implement solutions that are thoughtful, well designed and that produce powerful results for our clients

properties.name: Hoodiny Entertainment Group
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc4970 SW 72nd Avenue, Suite 100, Miami, FL 33155Hoodiny was formed to create the leading “digital escapist” of the Hispanic entertainment market. What is Hispanic entertainment? It is not easy to generalize, but to us, it represents entertainment that is conceptualized, influenced and developed for the millions of Spanish speakers and/or persons whose ancestry hails from Spain and Latin America. But if you like Shakira, Carlos Mencia and Daddy Yankee, you like Hispanic entertainment.

properties.name: IMified
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcImified is an instant messenger buddy that works across all major IM networks and offers access to a growing number of web applications, as well as productivity tools like notes, reminders, and todo\'s. Imified helps you get things done faster.

properties.name: Largo Tech
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcThe EyeViewer360 web application was designed to provide a rich immersive experience in mapping that also explores local information visually. This fantastic software application allows users to take a “virtual city car ride” anywhere to take a detailed look around. Once stopped at ground level the user can look in any direction, point to any location and see a real view of the area.

properties.name: MIT Enterprise Forum
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc350 E Las Olas Blvd, Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301, USAThe MIT Enterprise Forum of South Florida is a volunteer, not-for-profit organization whose mission is to provide educational programs and services that promote and strengthen innovation at the intersection of business and technology. The MIT Enterprise Forum of South Florida is dedicated to promote and strengthen innovation and growth of technology industry and businesses throughout the tri-county area of Miami-Dade, Broward and Palm Beach.

properties.name: Metalinker.org
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcMetalink is an Open Standard that bundles the various ways (FTP/HTTP/P2P) to get files into one format for easier downloads. That\'s probably already more detail than you want. It\'s just...Simpler. Faster. More Reliable. Better.

properties.name: Multiply
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc6001 Park of Commerce, Suite 300, Boca Raton, FL 33487Multiply gives you an easy way to share all kinds of digital media, including photos, blogs, videos, music and more, all in one convenient place: your own personal web site. With Multiply, you can share and discuss your stuff with everyone in your "social network," and also be alerted whenever they have something new.

properties.name: Publictivity

properties.name: Scrapblog.com
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc2 Alhambra Plaze, Suite 700, Coral Gables, FL 33134If you love sharing photos like we do, you\'ll love Scrapblog. With Scrapblog, you can easily create stunning multimedia scrapbooks featuring your photos, videos, audio and a bunch of creative elements. We made Scrapblog drag-and-drop-easy so that everyone can tell their stories and share them online or turn them into high-quality photo books and DVDs. Best of all, it\'s free and there\'s nothing to download.

properties.name: ShareImages.com
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcShareImages.com is a free image hosting solution. It is designed for you to share digital pictures with friends, post images on message and bulletin boards and blogs.

properties.name: The Gorb
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcMiami, FLTheGorb is a site that collect opinions and delivers a reliable measure of a person’s conduct based on other user’s opinions about them. TheGorb is the place where people can openly evaluate each other, and where your reputation is online.We are all human, implicitly this means we have gray areas. We are not perfect and we should accept this. Challenging these imperfections is what makes the journey of life rewarding.We should welcome the criticism of others as well as the positive reinforcement we get. We should be able to share our wisdom of others both on the good and bad traits with out consequence. We should do this because our voice matters, it is equally powerful to any other. We should use this power judiciously, do good with this power. How much gray, green or orange is in your life?

properties.name: The Web 2.0 Show
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc The Web 2.0 Show is a podcast about emerging technologies commonly referred to as "Web 2.0". We focus on interviewing the developers and entrepreneurs who are creating the next generation of web services and media delivery. Our goal is to help you figure out where the web is headed. Like you, we are hard at work developing our own cool projects. Maybe we can learn something together.

properties.name: Wufoo
properties.description: Posted by Alexdc16057 W Tampa Palms Blvd, Tampa, FL, 33647, USAWufoo is an Internet application that helps anybody build amazing online forms. When you design a form with Wufoo, it automatically builds the database, backend and scripts needed to make collecting and understanding your data easy, fast and fun. Because we host everything, all you need is a browser, an Internet connection and a few minutes to build a form and start using it right away.

properties.name: arcticTropic
properties.description: Posted by AlexdcArcticTropic offers direct access to independent adventure minded travelers with the time and money to pursue their dreams. Primarily they are business owners or have family fortunes. Fly-fishing in Patagonia, Antarctic expeditions, horseback riding across Mongolia, hunting in Siberia or renting a castle in Poland are just some of their preferences. ArcticTropic brings worldwide destinations and their websites together in one location - increasing the number of visits and time spent on our site.
